Description.Text: Sid Valley Country House Hotel is a peaceful idyll in a stunning setting amidst the rolling hills of south Devon. 15 miles west of Exeter and just a 5 minute drive from the attractive seaside resort of Sidmouth, the hotel is the perfect place to relax and unwind or use as a base to explore the Devonshire countryside or the Jurassic Coast World Heritage site. The hotel is family run and guests are made to feel very welcome. All rooms are spacious and attractively furnished with smart, modern bathrooms. Families with children are accommodated in the adjoining cottage suites which have the advantage of a separate sitting room. The restaurant serves fresh local food, cooked by the owners, and there is a bar open to residents. Sidmouth also has plenty of bars and restaurants to choose from. The grounds offer ample space for relaxing and walking. The outdoor pool is open in the warmer months and there is a tennis court for guests` use. There is ample parking available at the hotel.
